text: Andreas Appelgren (born July 23, 1967) is a Swedish ice hockey coach. He is currently the head coach for Leksands IF of the Swedish Hockey League (SHL). Appelgren joined the Leksands IF organization with the 2011–12 season as an assistant coach, and was promoted to head coach when he replaced Christer Olsson mid-season. ==References== ==External links== *Andreas Appelgren's profile at Eliteprospects.com Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish ice hockey coaches
title: Andreas Appelgren
